About Me

Hey there! I'm Flogert, a game artist who lives for creating cozy, heartwarming digital worlds.

When I'm not drawing cute characters or designing magical environments, you'll find me playing indie games, sipping matcha lattes, or cuddling with my cat.

I specialize in character design, environment art, and UI/UX for games. Let's create something magical together!
